vsParam:
Hey, Nelke!
We are sorting our alchemy recipes!

Ah, so I guessed correctly!
Can I take a look?

Uh? Of course you can...
Are you interested in alchemy too?

Yeah! My world also has alchemy,
and there are many alchemists from different worlds...

The development of Westwald relies on alchemy,
so I'm quite familiar with it.

Wow!
There are alchemists in your world, too!

Yes... Uh, [px]! If you don't mind,
can you make something for me to see?

I want to see
this world's alchemy!

Done! How's that?
This is the alchemy in our world!

Uh, you also use alchemical Cauldron here... So the
difference is only the names of items and ingredients?

The item you made seems to be different, too...
Looks like some in-depth study is needed!
I am glad to make you happy!

Ah, I'm sorry!
I lost in thought...

Yeah! Thank you, [px]!
You just showed me something very interesting.

Ha ha! Nelke,
you are really into alchemy!

Sorry... I always get too excited to notice anything else
in my surroundings when talking alchemy...

[px] is also like that.
But, why do you like alchemy so much, Nelke?

Um... There's a person called "the Sage of Granzweit"
in the world where I come from.

This sage traveled all over the world and helped people with
alchemy... There're great stories about the sage in many places.

When I heard about these stories,
I became attracted to sages and alchemy.

Oh, I see!
Why don't you study alchemy too?

Um... Sorry.
I can't use alchemy...
Ah... My apologies. I said silly things...

Ho ho, never mind. Even if I can't use alchemy,
I'll make contributions to people in other forms!

Wow...
You are so cool, Nelke!

In order to help other people,
we must work harder!
